recapArticle.title: USMNT 0, Germany 1: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group G Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Here we go. #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: Bert Weiss
timelineItems.text: Does the #USMNT know they are allowed to put the ball on Germanys half of the pitch? #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Toni Kroos (Germany) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mesut Özil.

timelineItems.name: Kate
timelineItems.text: C'mon #usmnt #usa defense looks a little confused. #usavsger

Fabian Johnson (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: #FreeSyria #FreeGaza
timelineItems.text: Its gonna be a good game #USAvGER #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Kevin Connelly
timelineItems.text: This looks an awful lot like the #USMNT are playing for a tie

timelineItems.name: nw,rn
timelineItems.text: possession starting to improve. moving in the right direction. now don't give up costly counter. #usavger

timelineItems.name: Chase Williams

timelineItems.name: Cameron Bowden
timelineItems.text: Omar Gonzales might be a game changer. #LetsDoThis #USAvGER

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Germany. Toni Kroos tries a through ball, but Thomas Müller is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Josh Lafon
timelineItems.text: Germany getting some chances early but the defense for Team USA holding up well so far #USAvGER #USA

timelineItems.name: Chris Haddock
timelineItems.text: Whatever Tim Howard is paid it is not enough. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. DaMarcus Beasley (USA) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Michael Goldsmith
timelineItems.text: @clint_dempsey is about to go liam neeson on Germany. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lukas Podolski (Germany) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Thomas Müller.

timelineItems.name: Griffin Smith
timelineItems.text: Beckerman playing dirtier than his hair I like it #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Thomas Müller (Germany) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Match ends, USA 0, Germany 1.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Morales
timelineItems.text: I believe that we just survived the Group of Death! Bring on Belgium #USMNT #merica

timelineItems.name: Danny Pfrank
timelineItems.text: Round of 16! Great job #USMNT and thank you Ronaldo! Now to figure out plans for Tuesday afternoon... #O2TN

timelineItems.name: Sean Flanery
timelineItems.text: WE'RE THROUGH!!!!!!!! USA USA USA USA USA USA!!!! �������������� #USMNT #IBelieveThatWeWillWin

timelineItems.name: Kyle Leathers
timelineItems.text: Goodbye, Group of Death. Hello, Round of 16! #USMNT #IBelieveThatWeWillWin

timelineItems.desc:
Re-live the best moments of USMNT vs. Germany's final Group G match in Recife, Brazil.

Catch all MLSsoccer.com's World Cup coverage at www.mlssoccer.com/worldcup

timelineItems.text: Very pedestrian start to game by #Germany. Trying to defeat #USMNT while on midsummer stroll. #US is bad, but not that bad! #USAGER #WC2010

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Germany. Bastian Schweinsteiger tries a through ball, but Lukas Podolski is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Birdmizzle
timelineItems.text: Ok, #USMNT this guy Klose.....dude is serious...gotta keep him from the ball and the goal lol

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bastian Schweinsteiger (Germany) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Attempt missed. Mesut Özil (Germany) header from very close range is too high. Assisted by Jerome Boateng with a cross.
Offside, USA. Jermaine Jones tries a through ball, but Brad Davis is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: William J.
timelineItems.text: Gonzalez is putting in the defensive work #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Dan Popko
timelineItems.text: So it's kinda frustrating when Omar Gonzalez shows you why he should and still can be the best defender the #USMNT has if he was consistent.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, USA. Tim Howard tries a through ball, but Clint Dempsey is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Diagonal ball going to be there all day long for Germany. It's what the #USMNT has decided to give them. Nothing up the gut. #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: MK
timelineItems.text: You know your workplace is cool when they order pizza for everyone & send you to a room to watch the #USMNT on the big screen!

timelineItems.name: Julie Foudy
timelineItems.text: At what stage, if scores hold, do both teams just play cautious & start knocking around. I say at 70'. #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: ShoeSiren
timelineItems.text: Deuce needs to score. Bring in Yeddy! #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Miroslav Klose (Germany) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Bastian Schweinsteiger with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ian Eccles
timelineItems.text: Give Muller the space and he'll deliver crosses all day. Close him down instead of sitting back! #USAGER #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Andy Schreur
timelineItems.text: Everyone staring at the ball and calling for offside. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).
Philipp Lahm (Germany) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc:
The USMNT finish Group G against European powerhouse Germany.  What lineup do Jesse Marsch and Matt Doyle expect?  How will Jurgen Klinsmann change his tactics?  And who do the experts pick to advance?

For more World Cup coverage: http://www.mlssoccer.com/WorldCup

Brazil Bound Giveaway rules:
http://www.mlssoccer.com/brazilboundgiveawayrules
timelineItems.title: USMNT vs Germany World Cup Preview | Brazil Bound

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Bad slide tackle by Bradley. Completely unnecessary. #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Germany. Conceded by Brad Davis.
Attempt saved. Per Mertesacker (Germany) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mesut Özil with a cross.

Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: bill gordon
timelineItems.text: That was coming. Germany 1-0. #USMNT clinging to life now if they lose their focus. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Ruthie Wittenberg
timelineItems.text: Collective cursing commence. #USAvsGermany #USA #USMNT #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Ryan Scibilia
timelineItems.text: Awful defending. Great finishing. #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: Jeff Pini
timelineItems.text: Thomas Muller. #USMNT can't control the rebound after a great save by Tim Howard, Germans take 1-0 lead.

timelineItems.comment: Kyle Beckerman (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Miroslav Klose (Germany).

timelineItems.name: John Thompson
timelineItems.text: Hoping USA isn't imploding #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: Danielle

timelineItems.name: I, Bacon
timelineItems.text: I really hope the #usmnt doesn't sit back and play for a draw. I think that's a sure way to get beat against this Germany team.

timelineItems.name: E C
timelineItems.text: Grillin outside, enjoying a beer, chillin with man's best friend.That's pretty American. Go #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Kim Kolb
timelineItems.text: Anyone else think fresh legs for Dempsey is a good idea? #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Total चुतियापा
timelineItems.text: How about some Ronaldo magic here to take the pressure off. #PORvsGHA #USMNT #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Jermaine Jones (USA) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Jones and Bedoya crash at midfield. This is getting uglier by the second. #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jason Dambach
timelineItems.text: #GER keeper is so bored that he is starting to run to the center of the field for the heck of it #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Kacie Wilson
timelineItems.text: My heart. The stress. This game. I can't. #USMNT #USvsGER #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Megan Angelina
timelineItems.text: Poor Clint Dempsey, that man's nose will never be the same shape after this world cup #USMNT #USA #USAvsGermany

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by DaMarcus Beasley (USA).

timelineItems.name: Coach Nathan Smith
timelineItems.text: After 75, #USMNT need a touch of class to pull this off. A bit of high pressure could help, tough when the Germans had 26 more hours rest!!

timelineItems.name: Dominique Janvier
timelineItems.text: Where is Brooks when you need him? #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: Nate Davis
timelineItems.text: I'm no soccer savant, but wet balls can take strange bounces, so watch goalies' ballhandling closely. #usmnt @themikefoss @JesseYomtov

timelineItems.name: danram7
timelineItems.text: Let's go!!! #Repost from @ussoccer --- Real American spirit everywhere. Hulkamania gripping the #USMNT fans. #LetsDoThis #OneNationOneTeam Germany, Whatcha gonna do you …

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Benedikt Höwedes (Germany) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mesut Özil.
Corner,  Germany. Conceded by Omar González.

timelineItems.name: AT
timelineItems.text: Ronaldoooooooo!!!!! Help us out baby!!! #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Brad Sheffield
timelineItems.text: Thank you Ronaldo #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: And I hereby declare thee San Ronaldo. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Omar González (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benedikt Höwedes (Germany).

timelineItems.name: Kali Hodges
timelineItems.text: Yes to Yedlin! Let's mix this up. #usavsger #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Con su gol al minuto 80, Cristiano Ronaldo le da otro respiro a #USA: http://t.co/fZx7mBwP1p #USAvGER http://t.co/R0G5FDSV7U

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Con su gol al minuto 80, Cristiano Ronaldo le da otro respiro a #USA: http://t.co/fZx7mBwP1p #USAvGER http://t.co/R0G5FDSV7U

timelineItems.name: Shawn Burns
timelineItems.text: Here comes Deandre!!! #gozips #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Joe Smith
timelineItems.text: Fairplay to America.. Impressed with how good they are.. England should he ashamed this lot would beat us all day #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Germany. Mario Götze tries a through ball, but Miroslav Klose is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Philip Flach
timelineItems.text: Never really watched soccer, but it's obvious the Germans are in much better shape than the the #USMNT #embarrassing

timelineItems.name: Patrick Lusk
timelineItems.text: #Usmnt looks like they haven’t ever trained together today. No two of them on the same wavelength.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Bradley (USA).
Mario Götze (Germany) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Meredith Wright
timelineItems.text: I don't think we have played a straight 8 minutes this game without a foul. Play the ball not the person. #sheesh #USMNT #USAvsGermany

timelineItems.comment: Thomas Müller (Germany) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by DaMarcus Beasley (USA).

timelineItems.name: Scott Overpeck
timelineItems.text: Really wish the #USMNT would just score and end this whole thing! #IBelieveThatWeWillWin #USAvGER

timelineItems.name: geoff bucholz
timelineItems.text: This #USAvGER referee is terrible.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Germany. Conceded by Brad Davis.

timelineItems.name: Harrison Slobodien
timelineItems.text: Knockout round bound #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Germany. Manuel Neuer tries a through ball, but Thomas Müller is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Brett Landrum
timelineItems.text: Not the way I wanted to see #USA head into the 2nd round, but we are still playing. That is all that matters. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. André Schürrle (Germany) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Thomas Müller.

timelineItems.name: Chris B
timelineItems.text: We will survive the group of death!! #IBelieve #USMNT #letsgoUSA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Alejandro Bedoya (USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Clint Dempsey.
Attempt missed. Clint Dempsey (USA) header from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Marvin Chun
timelineItems.text: Bedoyaaa ohh #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Riya Vongphit
timelineItems.text: OOOOOOOOOOO HEART ATTACK #USAvGER

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, USA 0, Germany 1.

timelineItems.name: TATE⚽
timelineItems.text: AND THE #USMNT MOVES ON TO THE KNOCKOUT STAGES #1N1T #IBelieveThatWeWillWin ��⚽
